roleset.name: feel emotional insecurities

example.name: arg1
example.text: I can be pretty insecure at times -LRB- it 's a wonder I actually made it back to hers , because I was worried I was imposing too much -RRB- , and when I woke up I panicked and said I had to go and get some work done -LRB- which I genuinely did , although thinking back on it , it was a weak reason to leave -RRB- .

example.name: both args
example.text: She is very critical towards herself, her education, and is insecure in her value as a professional.
example.arg: in her value as a professional.

example.name: both args
example.text: Madonna is insecure about her thighs, says her personal trainer

roleset.note: INSECURE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-4,5. (from insecure.01-j)

roleset.name: not safe, strapped down well, etc.
roleset.note: INSECURE-J NOTES: Added by Julia, related to secure.02. (from insecure.02-j)
